newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Venezuela bolivar closes off, cenbank intervenes.
newsitem.headline: Venezuela bolivar closes off, cenbank intervenes.

text.p: The Venezuelan bolivar softened in strong trade to close at a 471.00/472.00 bolivar per dollar floor set by Central Bank intervention, traders said.
On Wednesday, the unit closed at 470.75/472.00 per dollar.

"Demand was busier in the afternoon," said one trader. "But after a two-day absence, the Central Bank was there throughout the session, supplying dollars, covering and protecting the exchange rate," he added.
